actions.name: Mountain Racer

cost.trigger: The user declares a Fighting- or Electric-Type Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Fighting- or Electric-Type Attack.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 20% chance of inflicting @Affliction[taunted] 7 and on @Affliction[grounded] 7.

actions.name: Mountain Racer (Afflicted)

cost.trigger: The user targets a creature that is afflicted with @Affliction[grounded] with an Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user targets a creature that is with afflicted @Affliction[grounded] with an Attack.

Effect: The triggering Attack has gains [Push 2], or [Push X+2] and [Crit 2], or [Crit X+2], against the designated target.

system.description: Effect: The user’s Fighting- and Electric-Type Attacks have a 20% chance of inflicting @Affliction[taunted] 7 and on @Affliction[grounded] 7 on valid target(s). The user’s attacks have [Push 2], or [Push X+2] and [Crit 2], or [Crit X+2], against creatures that have @Affliction[grounded]. The user possesses the [Electric] Tutor List.
